import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Register() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); }; return (
